string-array.name: notes_array
string-array.item: This is a sample app created for demonstration certificate pinning in Android by Aniket Thakur.
Source code for this app is present on github - https://github.com/aniket91/CertificatePinning
You can select pinned on unpinned mode from options menu
Unpinned mode allows all https urls as long as android OS trusts it (default behavior)
Pinned mode pins www.ssllabs.com public certificate. All other https calls will fail in this mode.
Please contact aniketthakur91@gmail.com for any further questions or suggestions
